name: Kathleen M. BYRNES, Appellee, v. Harry D. CALDWELL, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Kathleen M. BYRNES, Appellee, v. Harry D. CALDWELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Superior Court is reversed. See Curtis v. Kline, No. 6 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1994, — Pa. —, 666 A.2d 265 (1995).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
MONTEMURO , J.,
joined by CAPPY, J., dissents based on his Dissenting Opinion in Curtis v. Kline, noting in addition “we are cognizant of the issue of retroactivity, but because the majority has declared the Act unconstitutional, this issue is moot.”
MONTEMURO, J., is silting by designation.
opinions.author: MONTEMURO , J.,

attorneys: Francis Recehuiti, Morristown, for H. Caldwell.
Peter E. Moore, Morristown, for K. Byrnes.
Albert J. Momjian, Philadelphia, PA, Amicus.
casebody.head_matter:
665 A.2d 1160
Kathleen M. BYRNES, Appellee, v. Harry D. CALDWELL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1995.
Decided Oct. 10, 1995.
Francis Recehuiti, Morristown, for H. Caldwell.
Peter E. Moore, Morristown, for K. Byrnes.
Albert J. Momjian, Philadelphia, PA, Amicus.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
